channel.title: A Few Questions
channel.description:
[center] I'm working on a huge Client Update for my Server that I need to be done with for New Years. I have some of it done, but I need help with some stuff. If people could help it would be awsome! :D
So Far it looks like this
[IMG]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/stewie0888/inven-1.png[/img]
--------------------- What I Need:
[b]What to put where the Black areas and Columns Are[/b] How to Change the MapBack [Tried Editing Cache and Sprite got some blurry stuff] [b]Making my Characters Look more detailed [Like a 508 sort of with the hair and face][/b] Clickable Ingame Links [b]HD Sky Fog[/b] Fix Textures [b]Add Some Better looking NPCs [like the characters][/b] Saradomin Sword Models [b]HandCannon Models[/b] Add Redstones? [I have the pic I just can't get it in]
If you could help please PM Me, Post, or MSN support@stewiescape.com
I only have 10 Days

I will help with a few models. added you on msn already.

item.title: A Few Questions

item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

[center]
I’m working on a huge Client Update for my Server that I need to be done with for New Years. I have some of it done, but I need help with some stuff. If people could help it would be awsome!

So Far it looks like this

How to Change the MapBack [Tried Editing Cache and Sprite got some blurry stuff]
